title: SHADOW AND BONE Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment:
Please donate to my baby goat fund!

Like this video? Check out my other Fantasy videos: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7iajBX4Ibg6jaCAH1eIuSgd
I super happy with how the show turned out. They did my Crows justice especially Jesper who was amazing. Kit Young is such a charismatic actor. Milo and Jesper better reunite in the future 🐐
I hope Mal and Alina become good friends with the crows in the next seasons. I'd love to see their friendship.

Thought it was gonna be a low budget, cheesy teen romance series. Turned out it was a high budget, less cheesy fantasy series with a lot of romance subplots.
Season 2, lets do this!
Nina and Mathias's relationship is gonna be a great highlight of season 2.
description:
In this video we  explain, review, and breakdown the ending to Netflix's "Shadow and Bone" its lore, characters, Grishaverse and more! Based off the best selling book by Leigh Bardugo.
